strings.value: Yo'q, men xursand edim. Men hayajonlangan edim!

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: No, I was happy. I was excited!

strings.value: Nega? Sara xafa yoki asabiy edimi?

context.speaker: Ali
context.en_line: Why? Was Sara sad or nervous?

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: No, we were at a party.

context.speaker: Zara
context.en_line: I was at the beach and the park.

context.speaker: Laylo
context.en_line: Were you at home yesterday evening?

strings.value: Yo'q, men muzeydagi bazmda edim... yoki kutubxonada!

context.speaker: Zara
context.en_line: No, I was at a party at the museum... or the library!

strings.value: Ali qayerda edi? U ishda edimi?

context.speaker: Tom
context.en_line: Where was Ali? Was he at work?

strings.value: Yo'q, u (u yerda) emas edi. U u yerda yo'q edi.

context.speaker: Ben
context.en_line: No, he wasn't. He wasn't there.

strings.value: Uchrashuv qachon edi? Ular nega kechikishdi?

context.speaker: Tom
context.en_line: When was the meeting? Why were they late?

context.speaker: Ben
context.en_line: They weren't late. How was your day?

strings.value: Men qo'rqib ketdim va xavotir oldim.

context.speaker: Lola
context.en_line: Why were you angry? Be calm.

context.speaker: Mina
context.en_line: The hotel was peaceful and comfortable.

strings.value: 'Was' = I/he/she/it bilan (birlik). 'Were' = you/we/they bilan (ko'plik). 'Was' — o'tmish zamondagi 'am/is'.
'Were' = you/we/they (ko'plik + you). 'You were' — birlik 'you' ham 'were' oladi (hech qachon 'you was' emas!).
Siz va do'stlaringiz kecha qayerda edingiz?
Ingliz tilida 'be + adjective' = his/holat. 'I was happy' = men xursand edim. 'Feel' — ixtiyoriy: 'I felt happy' ham to'g'ri.
Hislar juftlikda keladi: happy ↔ sad, excited ↔ nervous, calm ↔ angry. Qarama-qarshi ma'nolar.
Ba'zi sifatlar fe'ldan: tire → tired, excite → excited, worry → worried. '-ed' = '...gan' holatda.
'Nervous' = bezovta/asabiy (kichik xavotir). 'Anxious' = jiddiy xavotir. A1 darajada 'nervous' yetarli.
Ular safar haqida nima deb o'ylashdi?
'Excited' = inson hissi (I was excited). 'Exciting' = narsa/voqea sifati (The trip was exciting). '-ed' = his, '-ing' = sabab.
'Yesterday' gap boshida yoki oxirida kelishi mumkin: 'Yesterday I was tired' yoki 'I was tired yesterday'. Ikkalasi ham to'g'ri.
'At' = umumiy joy (at the museum, at school). 'In' = ichida (in the room, in the building). 'At' kengroq tushuncha.
Ma'lum joylar uchun 'the' ishlatiladi: 'the park' (bizning park). 'A park' = har qanday park. Kontekstda ma'lum bo'lsa — 'the'.
'At the beach' = plyajda (umumiy). 'On the beach' = plyaj ustida (aniqroq). Ikkalasi ham to'g'ri, 'at' — kengroq.
'Library' = /ˈlaɪbrəri/ (LAI-bre-ri). Ko'p o'quvchilar 'libary' deyishadi — noto'g'ri. Ikkita 'r' harfi bor.
'A party' = har qanday bazm (birinchi marta aytilmoqda). 'The party' = ma'lum bazm (ikkinchi marta yoki qaysi ekani aniq). Birinchi safar — 'a'.
'Home' maxsus so'z — artiklsiz ishlatiladi: 'at home' (uyda), 'go home' (uyga borish). 'At THE home' = keksalar uyi.
'Yesterday evening' = kechqi soatlar (6-9). 'Last night' = kechasi (9+). Ikkalasi ham o'tmish vaqt ko'rsatkichi.
Men u yerda o'tgan hafta edim.
'Last' + vaqt = o'tgan: last week, last month, last year, last night. Hammasi o'tmish zamon bilan ishlatiladi.
Men u yerga o'tgan hafta bordim.
'Weren't' = 'were not' (ko'plik inkor). You/we/they bilan: 'We weren't tired'. I/he/she uchun — 'wasn't'.
Savol so'z + was/were + subject: 'Where WAS Ali?'. Savolda fe'l subject oldiga o'tadi (inversion). 'Where Ali was' — NOTO'G'RI.
Yes/No savollarda 'was/were' gap boshiga o'tadi: 'Was he sick?' (U kasal edimi?). 'He was sick' → 'Was he sick?'.
Qisqa javobda faqat: 'Yes, I was' yoki 'No, I wasn't'. To'liq gapni takrorlamang. Qisqa javob = subject + was/were.
Savolga javob bering: Were you happy yesterday?
'How was' = sifat/holat haqida so'raydi: 'How was the food?' (Ovqat qanday edi?). Javob: 'It was good/bad/great'.
'Why' = nega/sabab. Javob 'Because' bilan boshlanadi: 'Why were they late?' → 'Because they were in traffic'.
'When' = umumiy vaqt (When was the party? → Last Friday). 'What time' = aniq soat (What time was the meeting? → At 3 o'clock).
'Un-' qo'shimchasi = aks: comfortable → uncomfortable, happy → unhappy, friendly → unfriendly. Ko'p sifatlarga 'un-' qo'shiladi.
'Worried' + 'about': 'I was worried about the exam'. 'About' = haqida. 'Worried' yolg'iz ham ishlatiladi: 'I was worried'.
'Angry WITH' = kishiga (angry with him). 'Angry ABOUT' = voqeaga (angry about the decision). Ikki xil.
'Afraid OF' + ot/gerund: 'afraid of dogs', 'afraid of flying'. 'Afraid' faqat predicative ('be afraid'), HECH QACHON otdan oldin kelmaydi.
'Be' = buyruq (imperative): 'Be calm!', 'Be quiet!', 'Be careful!'. Bu to'g'ridan-to'g'ri buyruq/maslahat. Subject yo'q.
'Peace' (tinchlik) + '-ful' = 'peaceful' (tinch). '-ful' = ...ga to'la: peace → peaceful, hope → hopeful, pain → painful.
